channel.title: Making a taser
channel.description: Hey, I got a question... I'm making a taser from a disposable camera, but I'm kind of lost. [img]http://img92.imageshack.us/img92/1073/0000150qi0ie4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img410.imageshack.us/img410/6250/0000152up2df8.jpg[/img] [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4107/dsc00024iq7.jpg[/img] If none are detailed enough then.. idk. That's what I'm up to so far, anyone know where I should go from here? The Capacitor and Flash thing both give a spark if touched by my knife...

item.title: Making a taser
item.dc:creator: @winston005 winston005
item.description:
@winston005 wrote:

this sounds awesome im going to make one.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a taser
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Well, I used speaker wire once and even paper clips would work. make sure that you discharge it before touching the leads. You can just either cut the leads going to flash bulb or solder it out. If you don’t have a soldering iron than I’d suggest getting one. I’ll go look for a better guide since im going off of memory here.Instead of soldering you could probably carefully hotglue the wires lol. I don’t believe the one I made even needed to be soldered though.check these guides for more info. http://www.instructables.com/tag/?limit:type:instructable=on&offset=0&q=disposable%20camera

Read full topic

item.title: Making a taser

item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:2, topic:61846”]remove the flash bulb and attach some probes/wires. Charge and shock.[/quote]Where can I get these wires? And for removing the flash bulb… Do I cut it from the copper? And do I need to solder the wires onto it once I figure out where to get them? (Because I’m sure I don’t have a soldering iron…

Read full topic
